text: Ani amhi tyacya va tya vastincya daramyana, jyancyata amhi sukha-samrd'dhi pradana karuna thevali hoti. Kahi vastya dusarya thevalya hotya, jya, margavara disuna yeta hotya ani tyancyata calanyaci (pravasaci) thikane niscita keli hoti, tyata ratri ani divasa santi suraksapurvaka hindata phirata raha
